line.kanji: Moon|Pride
line.english: Moon Pride

line.kanji: あなたの力になりたい
line.english: I want to become your strength

line.kanji: 涙は頬を伝い
line.english: Tears run down cheeks

line.kanji: 瞳は紅く燃える
line.english: Eyes burn red

line.kanji: 稲妻のように激しく
line.english: such as an intense lightning strike

line.kanji: 誰かが愛を叫ぶ
line.english: Someone's shouting out love

line.kanji: 例えどんな暗闇でも
line.english: even if you're in a dark place

line.kanji: 一人じゃないよね？
line.english: You're not alone, you know

line.kanji: 私達を 照らす Moonlight
line.english: we are illuminated by the moonlight

line.romaji: Onnanoko ni mo yuzurenu kyouji ga aru
line.kanji: 嗚呼 女の子にも譲れぬ矜持がある
line.english: Even girls have a sense of pride they can't give up

line.romaji: sore wa oujisama ni unmei nagezu mizukara tatakau ishi
line.kanji: それは 王子様に運命投げず 自ら戦う意志
line.english: don't leave your fate to the prince, fight with your own strength

line.romaji: shiny make up kagayaku yo hoshizora wo atsumete
line.kanji: Shiny Make Up 輝くよ 星空を集めて
line.english: Shiny make up, we'll shine together under the stars

line.romaji: tada mamorareru dake no kayowai sonzai ja nai wa
line.kanji: ただ護られるだけの か弱い存在じゃないわ
line.english: We're not frail girls who need to be protected

line.kanji: 悲しみの波に揺られ
line.english: Swayed by the wave of sadness

line.romaji: ikari no hi ni yakarete mo
line.kanji: 怒りの焔(ひ)に灼かれても
line.english: burnt by the flames of anger

line.kanji: 稲妻のように眩く
line.english: as dazzling as lightning

line.kanji: 永遠(とわ)の愛を誓う
line.english: I swear on the eternity of love

line.kanji: 例え今は 離れてても
line.english: Even if, right now we're far apart

line.kanji: 独りじゃないよね？
line.english: You're not alone, you know

line.kanji: 私達を 繋ぐ Moonlight
line.english: We're connected by the moonlight

line.romaji: onnanoko ni wa muteki no buki ga aru
line.kanji: 嗚呼 女の子には無敵の武器がある
line.english: All girls have an unbeatable weapon

line.romaji: sore wa yowasa ni yorisou manazashi to subete ukeireru tsuyo sa
line.kanji: それは 弱さに寄り添う眼差しと 全て受け入れる強さ
line.english: It's the strength to accept your weakness and overcome it

line.romaji: shiny make ep kirameku yo hoshizora ni idakarete
line.kanji: Shiny Make Up 煌めくよ 星空に抱かれて
line.english: Shiny make up, we'll shine together under the starry sky

line.romaji: toki wo koeta kizuna ga watashi ni yuuki wo kureru
line.kanji: 時を超えた絆が 私に勇気をくれる
line.english: Our bond that crosses time and space gives us strength

line.kanji: 恋しくて 切なくて 泣きたくなるよ
line.english: This love is so painful, it makes me cry

line.romaji: aitakute samishikute kake dashi sonna haato
line.kanji: 会いたくて 淋しくて 駈け出しそうな恋心
line.english: My heart is lonely and wants to meet you

line.romaji: kono hiroi uchuu de nando umarekawattemo
line.kanji: この広い宇宙で 何度生まれ変わっても
line.english: No matter the amount of times I'm reborn in this vast universe

line.kanji: あなたに恋をする
line.english: I'll fall in love with you

line.romaji: shiny make up habataku yo hoshizora no kanata e
line.kanji: Shiny Make Up 羽ばたくよ 星空の彼方へ
line.english: Shiny make up, we'll fly beyond the starry sky

line.romaji: tsumi ga mawaru sekai demo mirai wo shinjirareru
line.kanji: 罪が廻る世界でも 未来を信じられる
line.english: Sins may make the world go round buy I'll believe in the future

line.romaji: dakara shiny make up tatakau yo hoshizora wo matotte
line.kanji: だからShiny Make Up 戦うよ 星空を纏って
line.english: So shiny make up, we'll fight amongst the stars

line.romaji: atarashi densetsu ga ima koko kara hajimaru
line.kanji: 新しい伝説が 今ここから始まる
line.english: A new legend begins from now

line.romaji: La la pretty guardian sailor moon
line.kanji: La La Pretty Gurdian SAILOR MOON
line.english: La la pretty guardian sailor moon
